Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem

Classes for File and the file system

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PathFilter Extends FileFilter to add getDepth parameter to PathFilter.accept(File, int).
TraversePathIterable  
TraversePathIterableFactory Factory for TraversePathIterable.
TraversePathIterator  
TraversePathIterSettings  
 

Class Summary
DirectoryListing Replaces File.listFiles().
FileFilterUtils Utilities for interface FileFilter
PathFilterUtils Utilities for interface PathFilter.
TraversePathIterableFactoryImpl Stateless factory for TraversePathIterableImpl.
 

Enum Summary
FileType Classification for files: FileType.NORMAL_FILE and FileType.DIRECTORY.
TraversePathDepthPolicy Controls how a directory tree is traversed: depth-first or depth-last.
TraversePathExceptionPolicy How to handle exceptions thrown when retrieving directory listings.
 

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem Description

Classes for File and the file system

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya library.
